code: import{Link,useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{useEffect,useState}from'react';import'./Navbar.css';import{jsx as _jsx,Fragment as _Fragment,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Navbar=()=>{const navigate=useNavigate();const[user,setUser]=useState(null);const[menuOpen,setMenuOpen]=useState(false);useEffect(()=>{const storedUser=localStorage.getItem('user');if(storedUser)setUser(JSON.parse(storedUser));},[]);const logout=()=>{localStorage.removeItem('token');localStorage.removeItem('user');setUser(null);setMenuOpen(false);navigate('/login');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("nav",{className:"navbar",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",className:"navbar-logo",children:"MiniLinkedIn"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:`navbar-links ${menuOpen?'open':''}`,children:!user?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/login",onClick:()=>setMenuOpen(false),children:"Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/register",onClick:()=>setMenuOpen(false),children:"Register"})]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",onClick:()=>setMenuOpen(false),children:"Feed"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:`/profile/${user.id}`,onClick:()=>setMenuOpen(false),children:"Profile"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:logout,children:"Logout"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"menu-btn",onClick:()=>setMenuOpen(!menuOpen),children:"\u2630"})]});};export default Navbar;
